meanings.sent1: The explainers at the museum guided us through the exhibits.
meanings.sent2: The science teacher is a great explainer of complex concepts.
meanings.sent3: The group of explainers decided to start a podcast to share their knowledge.
meanings.sent4: Her ability to simplify difficult topics made her the explainers' queen.
meanings.sent5: The children's book featured a friendly explainer character who helped the protagonist.

meanings.definition: A tool or device used to provide explanations.
meanings.sent1: The new explainer on the website helped users understand the features better.
meanings.sent2: The interactive explainer video made learning about the product fun.
meanings.sent3: The explainer app quickly became popular among students for its clear tutorials.
meanings.sent4: The explainer chart visually represented the data for easy comprehension.
meanings.sent5: The explainer infographic simplified the complex process into easy steps.

meanings.definition: The act of explaining or clarifying something.
meanings.sent1: Her explainer of the rules helped everyone understand the game better.
meanings.sent2: During the meeting, the explainer of the project timeline was very detailed.
meanings.sent3: The explainer of the joke made it even funnier with their elaborate description.
meanings.sent4: His explainer of the scientific theory was so clear that even kids could grasp it.
meanings.sent5: The explainer of the recipe made cooking the dish seem effortless.
